snippet: The cable operator said it counted more broadband users than video customers for the first time in the second quarter.
abstract: Comcast says it had more Internet subscribers than video subscribers for first time during second quarter; reports earnings of $2.1 billion, up 10 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue rose 2.6 percent to $17.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: The cable operator said it counted more broadband users than video customers for the first time in the second quarter.

headline.main: Internet Customers Surpass Cable Subscribers at Comcast
headline.print_headline: Internet Customers Surpass Cable TV Subscribers at Comcast for the First Time
